title: Haansoft Unicode Characters
content:
**Font Family Names: Haansoft Batang and Haansoft Dotum**

Below was a list of all available Unicode Blocks for the Basic Multilingual Plane with the latest version, 5.1, and with the pending version, 5.2.

Tags@

Notes:  
\* Also has blank glyphs in this.  
\*\* Block is added to Unicode  
† Haansoft Unicode fonts doesn’t combine characters automatically  
‡ Automatic visual combination of Hebrew accents isn’t supported  
~ Contextual forms of those letters aren’t supported  
^ Cherokee has user-defined glyphs  
# Ogham was clipped off  
^^ Can’t show characters of blocks  
√ All glyphs are monospaced  
∑ Glyphs block taken from another font  
% Glyph displaying of Coptic aren’t supported  
° Used for orthography Korean  
· Sans-serif bold uses Helvetica Regular  
@ Tag latin small letter g is double-bowl
